alert.note: Alert for Western Alachua (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 7:07PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Alachua County through 800 PM EDT... At 707 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Archer, or 9 miles north of Williston. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Archer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
